Evaluation of noise detection performanc: Noise-identification effectiveness ratio: R2 (noise-related ICs, noise markers) / R2 (non-noise ICs, noise markers)
Evaluation of noise removal performance: Denoising-effectiveness ratio: Variance explained by noise markers in noise-related ICs / Variance explained by noise markers in denoised signal
Spatial overlap with known functional networks (Dice_non_noise)
